resources.string: Please update Artemis to the latest version to ensure you have a smooth experience. You can download the latest version from the Play Store.
A new version of Artemis is available with improvements and new features. We recommend updating to the latest version for the best experience.
You are using version %1$s while the oldest version currently supported is %2$s.
You are using version %1$s while the recommended version is %2$s.
